TextLang.Text: Memory Stick™
System Storage
The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
The system storage could not be accessed.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
There is not enough free space in the system storage.
Please wait...
An error has occurred.
The connection to the server timed out.
The download failed. The Memory Stick™ has been removed.
The download failed.
Install completed.
Installing... Please wait.
The install failed.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™. At least %1 more free space is needed to update.
There is not enough free space in the system storage. At least %1 more free space is needed to update.
Download completed.
Select a location to save to.
A file with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite the existing file?
This content cannot be downloaded again.
This system will be deactivated. When the system is deactivated, you will not be able to use content that requires activation on this system. Do you want to continue?

This system is activated with a different account. If you perform this operation, you will not be able to use content that requires activation of the other account on this system. Do you want to continue?
Activation completed.
Deactivation completed.
Activating... Please wait.
Do you want to cancel the download operation?
Downloading... Please wait.
The download failed. The Memory Stick™ is locked.
%1 Minutes Left
%1 Seconds Left
This game can only be downloaded to a PSP™go system.
Extension completed.
There is no content that requires a date extension. You must download the content.
The expire date could not be extended. You can use [%1] on only one PSP™ system.
The download failed. You can use [%1] on only one PSP™ system.
Copyright protection information is corrupted, and will be restored.
Activating... Please wait. It may take 1 minute or longer to activate this system.
This operation is not available here. For details, visit the following website on your PC: http://pc.playstation.net/

This PSP™ system could not be activated. Your account already has %1 portable devices activated for game content. To activate this PSP™ system, you must first deactivate one of these other portable devices. For more information, refer to the online manual.

This PSP™ system could not be activated. Your account already has %1 portable devices activated for video/comics/music content. To activate this PSP™ system, you must first deactivate one of these other portable devices. For more information, refer to the online manual.

This PSP™ system cannot be activated. This content cannot be used. Your account already has %1 portable devices activated for game content. To activate this PSP™ system, you must first deactivate one of these other portable devices. For more information, refer to the online manual.

This PSP™ system cannot be activated. This content cannot be used. Your account already has %1 portable devices activated for video/comics/music content. To activate this PSP™ system, you must first deactivate one of these other portable devices. For more information, refer to the online manual.
